![In-Ear Insights Strategic Value of Analytics] # In-Ear Insights: Strategic Value of Analytics
Posted on January 24, 2024 by Christopher Penn
In this episode of In-Ear Insights, the Trust Insights podcast, Katie and Chris discuss the crucial role of analytics in digital marketing and how it’s often seen as the bearer of bad news. They explore the common pitfalls companies face
